texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: For a recent project, I needed to automatically provision VM's for testing. I wanted to make the .vmx files on the fly with the exact configuration required, but I couldn't find documentation for the options that are allowed in the .vmx files. Luckily, a fellow named Ulli Hankeln has  made an impressive list  available on his site.
texts.text: For a recent project, I needed to automatically provision VM's for testing. I wanted to make the .vmx files on the fly with the exact configuration required, but I couldn't find documentation for the options that are allowed in the .vmx files. Luckily, a fellow named Ulli Hankeln has  made an impressive list  available on his site.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The listings contain tons of options that I wasn't aware of, and it also provides hints on which ones you shouldn't adjust.
texts.text: The listings contain tons of options that I wasn't aware of, and it also provides hints on which ones you shouldn't adjust.
